Table of Contents

Name

qlfqueue_create - allocate a lock-free queue

Synopsis

#include <qthread/qlfqueue.h>

qlfqueue_t *
qlfqueue_create (void);

Description

This function initializes a qlfqueue lock-free queue object. This queue provides global ordering, using the qthread_cas_ptr() functions.

See Also

qdqueue_create(3) , qlfqueue_destroy(3) , qlfqueue_enqueue(3) , qlfqueue_dequeue(3) , qlfqueue_empty(3)
